topic.title: Doesn't show what I am writing
topic.body:
I am on the latest version of ZerNet
I am on Linux (Fedora 29 on Gnome)
Firefox 66
I have a closed port

When I write something in a forum it doesn't appear what I write during I am writing. When I publsh it, it is all OK.

To repruduce it simply write somewhere something

![Screenshot from 2019-04-13 18-10-42](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46760284/56082299-7d3e3b80-5e17-11e9-8bdf-eb600c0a730e.png)
![Screenshot from 2019-04-13 18-10-45](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46760284/56082301-7fa09580-5e17-11e9-8f7f-9b9f48551ba3.png)
